Class Summary
BaseActionSignature There is one instance of this class in the application per @Action method per controller.
DefaultActionSignature  
FrontControllerContext And instance of this class is thread-safe.
FrontControllerInitializer  
GuiceInitializer A Guice Injector is thread-safe, and can be shared by multiple threads.
HttpActionInvoker  
HttpActionResolver  
HttpMethodActionSignature  
HttpRequestRouter  
MappedControllerDatabase A single instance of this class is meant to exist in the front controller context, to be shared by multiple threads.
RequestProcessor An instance of this class is not thread-safe and should not be shared by multiple threads.
